thread.title: A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes call out Trump at Grammys
thread.title_full: A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes call out Trump at Grammys

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes call out Trump at Grammys
text:
SEE IT: A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes get political during Grammys performance, calls out ‘President Agent Orange’ A Tribe Called Quest, Busta Rhymes call out Trump at Grammys NEW YORK DAILY NEWS   11:06 PM 
A Tribe Called Quest called out President Trump during a politically charged Grammys performance Sunday night. 
Joined on stage by Busta Rhymes and Anderson .Paak, the rap group blasted the President for his travel ban. 
“Thank you, President Agent Orange, for all of that evil that you’ve been perpetuating throughout the United States,” Rhymes said. “I want to thank President Agent Orange for your unsuccessful Muslim ban.” A Tribe Called Quest and Busta Rhymes performed a politically charged rap during the Grammys aimed at the Grammys. (LUCY NICHOLSON/REUTERS) 
In the background, A Tribe Called Quest knocked down a wall, symbolic of Trump’s call for a border between the United States and Mexico. 
The hip-hop group raised fists at the end of the performance and shouted “Resist.” Tags:
